attributes.action: Have All Public Sector Employee Salaries Justified
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Salaries are extreme in government and local councils for senior staff.  How can they justify the salaries based on work load?  MPs and all high ranking officials in the government to local councils should be held accountable for work they do for the public including the annual salaries they receive at the expense of the Tax payers, instead of feeding off the poor which seems to be a national hidden agenda for the rich.
